BodyName: Committee on Women and Gender Equity

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to annual reporting on racial and gender disparities in STEM education for high school students
Items.MatterName: Annual reporting on racial and gender disparities in STEM education for high school students

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to culturally competent training on recognizing the signs of female genital mutilation
Items.MatterName: Culturally competent training on recognizing the signs of female genital mutilation.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the issuance and correction of sex designations on death records
Items.MatterName: Issuance and correction of sex designations on death records.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.8573/A.8624-A, in relation to the practice of natural hair care and braiding.
Items.MatterName: Practice of natural hair care and braiding (S.8573/A.8624-A).

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to provide the necessary funds to ensure hospital and healthcare provider services for gender-affirming care remain accessible for all people in New York City
Items.MatterName: Provide the necessary funds to ensure hospital and healthcare provider services for gender-affirming care remain accessible for all people in New York City.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of health and mental hygiene to establish a program to train individuals to become doulas and provide doula services
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of health and mental hygiene to establish a program to train individuals to become doulas and provide doula services.
